title: Hiren's 15.2 restored Mac Bootcamp - bootable into Hiren's

forumNotes.author: arlesterc
forumNotes.content:
We have Hiren's 15.2 USB made per these instructions -[http://www.hiren.inf...tcd-on-usb-disk](http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootcd-on-usb-disk "External link") .

We have been able to boot the USB stick on a Mac system with it and also on a PC system - both systems see it as a bootable device. However when we try to boot a bootcamp MAC with it it is not seen as a bootable USB. However it is recognized from within the Windows VM. Anybody who could help us figure out what we are doing wrong/what we need to do please provide feedback.

Thanks in advance.
